          <title>
            <string language="hu">Nevezetes háromszögek szögei</string>
            <string language="en">The angles of notable triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Winkel der bemerkenswerten Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les angles des triangles notables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os ângulos de triângulos notáveis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli angoli dei triangoli notevoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι γωνίες των ξεχωριστών τριγώνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ángulos de triángulos notables</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szemléltető ábra a nevezetes háromszögek szögfüggvényeinek meghatározára.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstrating figure for the determination of the trigonometric function of the notable triangles</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">10,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">10, picture,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstrieren der Abbildung für die Ermittlung 
der trigonometrischen Funktion der bemerkenswerten Dreiecke</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démontrer la figure pour la détermination de la
fonction trigonométrique des triangles notables</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstrando a figura para a determinação da 
função trigonometric dos triângulos notáveis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione della figura per la determinazione 
della funzione trigonometrica dei triangoli notevoli</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταδεικνύοντας αριθμός για τον προσδιορισμό της 
trigonometric λειτουργίας των ξεχωριστών τριγώνων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostrar la figura para la determinación de la 
función trigonométrica de los triángulos notables</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
